titleStmt.title: The Protestant conformist, or, A plea for moderation contained in a letter from one conforming minister to another : and his answer to it.
titleStmt.author: N. Y.
N. D.

notesStmt.note: The letter is dated and signed "Septemb. 13, 1679. N.Y." and the reply "Septemb. 22, 1679. N.D."
Print show-through makes filmed copy difficult to read.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
